tr.task_description: Morfolojik analiz bir cümledeki kelimeleri morfemlerine ayırma işlemidir.
tr.usage_info:
Her bir cümleyi ayrı satıra yazınız. Cümle sonu işaretleri (., ! vb.) cümlenin son kelimesinden boşlukla ayrılmalıdır. 

Örneğin:
 "Şekerleri yedim ."
"Eve gittim ."

en.task_description: Morphological analysis is the process of extracting the morphological parses (root form, affixes, and morphological features) of a given word (token). Given a word, the morphological analyzer outputs all possible morphological parses of the word. The output of the morphological analyzer is normally fed later to the morphological disambiguator tool, which determines the correct morphological parse of the word (among all its possible morphological parses) based on the context.

paper_names: Morphological Parser, Morphological Disambiguator and Web Corpus
